channel.title: Outcomes on On Guessing Well
channel.description: Recent content in Outcomes on On Guessing Well

item.title: Making Good Decisions
item.description: Bottom Line Up Front This post introduces the basics of decision making under uncertainty. It was written for anyone interested in learning how to use decision theory to solve real-world problems. Learning Objectives In this post you will learn about: How to identify decision problems in the real-world. How to frame decision problems in terms of actions, outcomes, utility, and probability. How to solve decision problems by maximizing expected utility.
